id.name: Sistem Temu Balik Informasi
id.description: Sistem temu-balik informasi, model ruang vektor, model probabilistik, umpan-balik, perluasan query, thesaurus, evaluasi unjuk kerja sistem, mesin pencarian
id.syllabus: Sistem temu-balik informasi, model ruang vektor, model probabilistik, umpan-balik, perluasan query, thesaurus, evaluasi unjuk kerja sistem, mesin pencarian
id.outcomes: Mahasiswa mampu memahami teknik-teknik dan metode yang ada pada sistem temu balik informasi.

en.name: Information Retrieval System
en.description: Information retrieval system, vector space model, probabilistic model, feed-back, query expansion, thesaurus, evaluation of system performance, search engine
en.syllabus: Information retrieval system, vector space model, probabilistic model, feed-back, query expansion, thesaurus, evaluation of system performance, search engine
en.outcomes: Students are able to understand the techniques and methods in the information retrieval system.
